news.title: Breaking News: New Product Launched
news.description: We have just launched a new product in our store. Check it out now!

news.title: Holiday Sale Starts Now
news.description: Don't miss out on our amazing holiday sale. Discounts up to 50% off!

news.title: New Year Party Announcement
news.description: Join us for a spectacular New Year party with music, drinks, and entertainment!

news.title: Store Reopening After Renovation
news.description: We're excited to announce the reopening of our store after renovations. Visit us today!

news2.title: Sovuq tushdi, ammo uylarga issiqlik berilmayapti. Nega?
news2.description: Haftalik ob-havo taxminlaridan kelib chiqsak, haftaning 2-yarmida harorat ko‘tarilishi kutilyapti, bu esa hali-beri issiqlik berilmasligiga ishora bo‘la oladi.

news2.title: Hokimlik balansidagi orderli uyni rasmiylashtirib berishni va’da qilgan shaxs ushlandi
news2.description: Mazkur holatlar yuzasidan Jinoyat kodeksining 25, 168-moddasi (firibgarlik) bilan jinoyat ishlari qo‘zg‘atilib, tergov.

news2.title: Boshqaruv xodimlarining cheklangan soni
news2.description: Boshqaruv xodimlarining cheklangan soni o‘zgarmaydi — har bir hokimlik uchun 61−70 birlik, shuningdek, boshqaruv

news2.title: Toshkent shahar hokimi “Mablag‘ ajratish to‘g‘risida”gi qarorni imzoladi.
news2.description: oshkent shahar Iqtisodiyot va moliya bosh boshqarmasi 2024 yil Toshkent shahar mahalliy budjetiga tegishli o‘zgartirish kiritadi.
